TEXT.TITLE: NUTMEG INDUSTRIES INC <NUTM> YEAR JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr 14 cts Net 510,917 Sales 12.3 mln NOTE: Share adjusted for five for four stock split in January 1987. Backlog 13.0 mln dlrs vs 3,733,000 dlrs. Company began operating January 27, 1986. Reuter
